attributes.action: Stop using 0845 and 0870 as contact numbers for jobcentre plus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These numbers are usually money generating. A lot of people calling jobcentre plus are not well off and as a way of saving money pay for a flat rate for geographical numbers, these calls however are charged. Another problem is that some homes have call barring for these numbers.
